response.overview: Chinki loves her long, shiny hair and never wants it to be cut. One day, her father takes her to the nearby barber shop for a haircut. Chinki, upset and unwilling, tries to escape, holding on tightly to her beautiful hair. But eventually, her haircut is done and a realisation comes.

production_companies.name: Film and Television Institute of India

response.title: A Hairy Tale
